input_text:
Job Title: Drafter

Location: Watertown, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary

Leaders in the design, engineering and fabrication of rotary drum dryers and structural steel solutions are looking for their next Structural Steel Detailer/Draftsperson. This person will play a key role in the drafting of structural steel components for large-scale construction projects. Your responsibilities will include creating detailed drawings of beams, columns, connections, floor plates, cross-bracing, and anchor bolts. Working closely with project managers and engineers, you'll ensure accurate interpretation of design specifications and timely delivery of drawings. This role will also involve collaborating with various departments such as engineering, sales, marketing, accounting, and manufacturing to facilitate seamless production and construction processes.

Qualifications

Associates Degree Good CAD skills (Tekla preferred) A passion for structural steel industry Good communication skills

location: Watertown, Wisconsin

job type: Permanent

salary: $60,000.00 - 60,000.01 per year

work hours: 8am to 5pm

education: Associates

Responsibilities

Detailing and drafting structural steel components for timeline sensitive construction projects. Ability to work well with internal and external project managers and engineers Work with business development team by providing technical support both in house as well as in the field.

Qualifications

Experience level: Entry LevelMinimum 3 years of experienceEducation: Associates

Skills

CADdetailerAutoCADTeklaStructuralCivilAdvanced SteelDrafterSteelStructural SteelConstruction

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
